<title level="1" right="Trait">[Contingency](/Traits.aspx?ID=385)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 252 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

Spells with this trait grant you an action during the spell's effects, typically a reaction with a special trigger. They typically have a long duration, such as 24 hours. You can have only one spell with the contingency trait, or one [_contingency_](/Spells.aspx?ID=49) spell, active at a time. If you cast another spell with the contingency trait or _contingency_, the newer casting supersedes the older.
name: Contingency
